name: Kax
description:
This Is a fan game Of RE:RUN by dani.

all of this creidits go to dani for the original game RE:RUN.

CONTROLLS: W ,S, A, D, SPACE,  or UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT

to wall run go up to  a wall and press space to wall run.

to wall jump do the same as wall running but press a and d.

This Game Is Made With PLAYCANVAS 

//About Playcanvas:

PlayCanvas is an open-source 3D game engine/interactive 3D application engine alongside a proprietary cloud-hosted creation platform that allows for simultaneous editing from multiple computers via a browser-based interface. It runs in modern browsers that support WebGL, including Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome.
